review: Overall, my experience was pleasant and patient friendly. I just got a Lil overwhelmed by the pricing of the treatment . The treatment itself was satisfactory. I would give it a 4/5 . Will definitely come again in the future. Thanking the staff and doctors once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Post and Core,
review: The doctor explains everything very well before the treatment. She is well experienced and does everything to perfection.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Infrastructure is so good.. no waiting time.. car parking available.. circumstance is neat and clean

Dr. Vimala geetha was extremely professional  friendly and understanding.  I visited the clinic for my 3.5 yrs old kid regarding dental cavities.  Doctor examined kids teeth thoroughly and advised the treatment.  Treatment was successful. We were really happy with the results. Dr. Phanibabu and Staffs  did the best for my kid. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Hi I’m Aswin who is terribly afraid of the needles and Dr.Vimala is very sensitive to that and goes the extra mile to make me feel comfortable. The clinic was very on point to the COVID safety protocols. Dr. Vimala is very professional, she takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice. My gratitude for Dr. Vimala and her staff goes beyond the stars!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It’s always a pleasure going back here.The Doctors are extremely friendly; both Dr Vimalageetha and Dr Babu have always patiently explained the progress and the road forward and most importantly take the personal interest that many doctors sadly do no do today. A big thank you to them

Ravi F/o Ankit Ravi

I was initially scared but she put all my fears at bay and carried it out very well. 
Overall, a very good experience.

Dr Phani Babu and Dr Vimala Geetha. Both of them treated good and both educated the problem and treatment was very satisfying. I recommend them for dental issues. Clinic was clean and everything was done with eazee!! :)
